column4: dood - my hp laptop dv9000 running 10.4 i386 freezes to needing hard reboot about every day.
question - when it appears frozen - what can I do to try to recover before holding the power button down for hard shutdown?
Alt+SysRq+r wait a little the Alt+SysRq+s wait, the +e wait a few sec, the + i +u +b
lol you are just screwing with me, right? lol
Reboot System Even If Utterly Broken
ok.... several screen shots.... sorry m8... works will every other distro ive ever used :|
hang on.... if it where fronen thereed be no screenshot...???
i hard booted it then tried the sysreq thing after a reboot and it did a screenshot
